articles.description: West Ham stun Arsenal to record a third successive Premier League victory, denting the Gunners' title challenge in the process.
articles.title: West Ham stun Arsenal who miss chance to go top

articles.description: Preview followed by live coverage of Thursday's Premier League game between Brighton & Hove Albion and Tottenham Hotspur.
articles.title: Brighton & Hove Albion v Tottenham Hotspur

articles.description: Virat Kohli's defiant 76 fails to save India from being thrashed by an innings and 32 runs by South Africa in the first Test at Centurion.
articles.title: South Africa thrash India in first Test at Centurion

articles.description: Centre Manu Tuilagi is expected to miss the start of England's Six Nations campaign with a groin injury.
articles.title: Injured Tuilagi set to miss start of Six Nations

articles.description: Former champion Gerwyn Price is out of the PDC World Darts Championship after a shock 4-2 defeat by Brendan Dolan.
articles.title: PDC World Championship 2024: 2021 winner Gerwyn Price beaten by Brendan Dolan in third round

articles.description: Tottenham goalkeeper Hugo Lloris is in talks to join Major League Soccer side Los Angeles FC on a free transfer, ending 11 years in north London.
articles.title: Spurs keeper Lloris in talks with MLS side LAFC

articles.description: The crowds arrive for Championship fortnight, but for the other 50 weeks of the year, work continues at the All England Club.
articles.title: Winter at Wimbledon - Inside the Slam that never sleeps

articles.description: Mitchell Marsh helps Australia recover from 16-4 with a counter-attacking 96 as the hosts end day three 241 runs ahead.
articles.title: Marsh & Smith rescue Australia against Pakistan

articles.description: Kevin Durant leads Phoenix Suns to victory over Houston Rockets with 27 points, 16 assists and 10 rebounds.
articles.title: NBA round-up: Kevin Durant triple-double as Phoenix Suns beat Houston Rockets

articles.description: Arsenal are monitoring Matthijs de Ligt, Manchester United and Tottenham are keen on Serhou Guirassy, plus more.
articles.title: Arsenal interested in De Ligt - Friday's gossip
